117411.「ギャンブラーの桃源郷 カジノへようこそ！ \n ここは カジノコイン 売り場で:
Welcome to the Casino, a gambler's paradise! This is the Casino Token Counter.
You can purchase Casino Tokens up to a maximum of <%dL_BUY_MAX_COIN> held Tokens. You can exchange Casino Token Tickets here, too.

117516.「それでは 引き続き\n すごろくを お楽しみくださいませ！\n<end>:
Well then, please continue to enjoy Sugoroku!
<end>

117517.「あら ふくろに 空きがないみたいです。\n 景品を受け取るには どうぐや\n:
Well, it looks like your bag is empty. In order to receive your prize, you'll need to empty your bag... Please come back when
you've sorted out your bags...

117518.「現在 お預かりしている景品は\n ございません。\n<end>:
We don't have any prizes that you can receive
at the moment.
<end>

117519.「お預かりしている 景品はこちらです。\n では すべて お渡しさせていただきま:
These are all the prizes we're holding for
you. Please take them!
<end>

117522.「<%sM_PRIZE> ですね。\n はい！ どうぞっ！\n<break>:
<%sM_PRIZE>, is it?
Very good! Here you are!
<break>

117523.「お預かりしていた景品は\n すべて お渡しいたしました！\n 引き続き すごろ:
And that's all the prizes we were holding for
you! Please continue to enjoy Sugoroku!
<end>

117524.「どの景品を 受け取りになられますか？\n<break>:
Which prize did you want to take?
<break>

117525.「どの内容について 説明を聞きますか？\n<select_se_off>\n景品:
What would you like to hear about?
<select_se_off>
What is a prize collection counter?
Receiving
<select_end><close>

117526.「はい こちら すごろく景品の\n 受け取りカウンターについてですね。\n<br:
Yes, this is the backgammon prize collection counter... If you can't keep your prizes after playing backgammon, we'll hold them for
you temporarily... After the game is over, please come to the counter to receive your prizes... Of course, you will not lose your
prizes due to the passage of time...

117527.「かしこまりました。\n 景品の 受け取りについて\n ご説明させていただきます:
Yes, sir... I'd like to explain how to receive your prizes... When you play a backgammon game, the maximum number of prizes
you can keep is 7. Therefore, until you receive all your prizes, you cannot play another game of backgammon... When you play
backgammon again, you must receive all the prizes before you can play...

117528.「いらっしゃいませ。こちらは\n すごろく景品 受け取りカウンターです。\n 本:
Welcome. This is the Sugoroku Prize Counter.
How can I help you today?
<break>

117529.「いらっしゃいませ！ こちらは\n すごろく景品 受け取りカウンターです。\n<:
Welcome! This is the Sugoroku Prize Counter.
Since this is your first time, I'll give a brief explanation. This is a temporary storage for prizes you couldn't receive in Sugoroku.
If you're carrying too many items when you receive your prizes, they'll come here.
Please be mindful that if you have any prizes being held here, you won't be able to play Sugoroku until you pick them up.
If you need another explanation, please speak to me again. I hope you'll enjoy yourself here!

170103.「おや？\n どうやら 前回のプレイの報酬が\n 正常に受け取れなかったみたいで: Hmm? Well, it looks like you didn't receive your reward for your last play. The items you didn't receive will be held here for you...

170104.「お預かりしているアイテムから\n お好きなものを１つ 受け取れますので\n こ:
You'll receive one of the items we have on
hand, and you can choose from...<bw_break>

170105.「選びなおされるのですね。\n それでは どちらにいたしますか？\n<break:
You'll have to choose again... So, which
would you prefer?<break>

170106.「かしこまりました。\n では <%sM_PRIZE>を\n お渡しさせていただ:
Understood. Then, I'll give the
<%sM_PRIZE> to you.

170108.「こちらのアイテムは\n 『すごろく景品を受け取る』から\n 受け取ることができ: You can pick up these items from the "Backgammon Prize Collection" page, so please check... And now, without further delay...

170109.「あら 受け取りを キャンセルされますか？\n<yesno 2><break>: Oh. Would you like to cancel your pickup?<yesno 2><break>

170110.「かしこまりました。\n それでは またのご利用を \n おまちしております。\:
Yes, sir. Then we look forward to serving you
again...<end>
